name: 郭美純
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation & Get to know the class
Week 2: Verb Tense & practice
Week 3: Word Family & practice
Week 4: Preposition & practice
Week 5: Part of Speech & practice
Week 6: Adjective, Adverb, Noun & Practice
Week 7: Linking & Pronoun & practice
Week 8: Mocking Test (Reading Practice)
Week 9: Mid-term Examination 
Week 10: Listening practice (part 1)
Week 11: Listening practice  (part 1)
Week 12: Listening practice (part 2)
Week 13: Listening practice (part 2)
Week 14: Listening practice (part 3)
Week 15: Listening practice (part 3)
Week 16: Listening practice (part 4)
Week 17: Listening practice (part 4)
Week 18: Final Examination
scorePolicy:
班上期中考試 35%
班上期末考試 35%
其他 （小考，作業，出席率，上課參與）30%
materials:
longman preparation series for the toeic test (intermediate/advanced course)
handout prepared by the instructor
